compatibility.notes: QPL-1.0 allows for weak copyleft, meaning that while modifications to the original code must be shared under the same license, linking with other software under compatible licenses is permitted without imposing the same license on the entire work.

key_requirements: Distribute the Software in unmodified form with all notices.
Distribute modifications separately and include the license.
Ensure modifications are available under the same license.
license.name: QPL-1.0
obligations: Include the license document in all distributions of the Software.
Ensure that all recipients can access the complete machine-readable source code.
Do not alter or remove any copyright notices in the Software.
Grant a non-exclusive royalty-free right to the initial developer for future distribution of modifications.
